scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp manifest.json background.js popup.html popup.js pageWorld.js onboarding.html onboarding.js returns-sidebar-inner.js returns-sidebar.css returns-sidebar.html theme-sync.js theme.css styles.css build/ && cp -r dist icons modules build/ && cd build && zip -r ../reclaim-extension.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf build && echo 'Packaged: reclaim-extension.zip'
